QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Mouthwash overdose
QAPair.Answer: Mouthwash overdose occurs when someone uses more than the normal or recommended amount of this substance. This can be by accident or on purpose. This article is for information only. DO NOT use it to treat or manage an actual overdose. If you or someone you are with has an overdose , call the local emergency number (such as 911), or the local poison control center can be reached directly by calling the national toll-free Poison Help hotline (1-800-222-1222) from anywhere in the United States.
